Kamaelia.Protocol.RTP

  • NullPayloadPreFramer
  • NullPayloadRTP ( NullPayloadPreFramer )

  • RTP ( RTPDeframer, RTPFramer )
  • RTPHeader
  • RtpPacker ( RtpPacker )
  • RTP support

RTP support

Components implementing aspects of the RTP protocol and defined in RFC 3550 and RFC 3551.

  • Kamaelia.Protocol.RTP.RTP implements components that perform basic framing and deframing of packets.
